row.quiz_title: How well do you really know what happens when you visit a doctor?

row.question: When you go to a doctor with a headache, backache or other small problems, how does he examine you?

options.fact: In general, the doctor gives medicine on hearing the problem. Instead the doctor should give time to the patient, since the beginning of many big diseases is very small ailments.
In general, the doctor gives medicine on hearing the problem. Instead the doctor should give time to the patient, since the beginning of many big diseases is very small ailments.

row.question: Do you know about Vital Science?

options.answer_description: Don't feel bad ... There is no age to learn.
options.fact: Vital science is the primary pillar of primary health in which comes five things - body temperature, blood pressure, pulse rate, respiratory rate, pain. It is important to check up these five things even in minor problems.

row.question: What is the normal body temperature?

options.fact: Normal body temperature is 99.5 ° F to 97.7. If the temperature of face is above 100.4 ° F (38 ° C) or temperature of ear is 101 ° F (38.3 ° C), the person has a fever. In children when the temperature is 100.4 ° F (38 ° C) or above, then the child has a fever.

row.question: When should you get your blood pressure checked?

options.answer_description: Any time. Checkup whenever you go to a doctor.
options.fact: Blood pressure should be checked regularly. In general, the blood pressure of a person is 90/60 to 139/89 mmHg. Source: Wikipedia

options.answer_description: Any time. Checkup whenever you go to a doctor.
If you are a kid, it's perfect.
options.fact: The pulse rate of a normal individual is 60-100 per minute.

row.question: What is the normal respiratory rate? Means how many times do you breathe in one minute?

options.answer_description: If you are over 12 years of age, this would be your respiratory rate.
options.fact: A baby of upto 6 months breathes in 30-60 times a minute. From 6 to 12 months a baby breathes in 24-30 times a minute. A child of 1-5 years breathes in 20 to 30 times a minute and an adult breathes in 12 to 20 times a minute. Source: Wikipedia

options.answer_description: This is the respiratory rate of 6-12 months old infant.

row.question: Do you feel pain in these parts of the body?

options.answer_description: If there is a pain in your limbs often, it means that you are not eating good food and should be taken as a warning for the future.
In this pain we use a pain spray and ignore the pain. While the meaning of pain in these parts of the body is that your daily lifestyle is not good and should be taken as a warning for the future.

Thought to be the most common disease in the world, if you treat headache by swallowing capsules or tea, be cautious. Headache is counted as an early symptom of many illnesses and should be taken as a warning for the future.

row.question: According to you, which kind of a doctor is important for living a healthy lifestyle?

options.fact: Most people would answer super specialists. While there is a need of basic health doctor for a healthy lifestyle. Super specialist doctors are specialists in diseases that are the specialization in one area. While the surgeon is a surgery specialist. A basic health doctor can save you from diseases occuring in the future by giving you basic information about your health in general conditions.
